parsers.name: Furball
parsers.notes: Event information is split across three pages, merge and consolidate. Always different cities, always bear events.

parsers.name: Rockbar
parsers.notes: Most events are not bear related. Always in NY at Rockbar. Only add events with bear/cub keywords or in allowlist.

parsers.name: Bearracuda
parsers.notes: Click each event and go to the next page to see special event information. Always different cities, always bear.

parsers.name: Megawoof
parsers.notes: Click each event and go to the next page to see special event information. Always different cities, always bear.
